Making stuff with

Motivation Science

Steven M. Ledbetter, aka "Stevo" or "Coach Stevo" is an expert in the science of human behavior change. He has built sucessful companies, products, and services that have helped thousands of people change their lives.

Stuff Stevo has made

Habitry

A consulting company using Practical Motivation Science to make more effective products.

  • Visit the Company

Habitry iOS

A cutting edge behavior change app for health coaches. Sold by Habitry from 2014-2016.

  • See the Design Process

Habitry Professionals

The first evidence-based, behavior change education platform for health coaches. Sold by Habitry in 2016.

  • See the Design Process

The Motivator

An annual research review of behavioral psychology.
Sold by Habitry in 2017.

  • See the Design Process

We Make Communities

A book for coaches who want to help the most people they can using Practical Motivation Science.

  • Buy the Book

The BetterCast

A podcast featuring real stories about people getting better at things.

  • Hear the Podcast
